com.compendium.core.db
Class DBViewNode

java.lang.Object
  com.compendium.core.db.DBViewNode

public class DBViewNode
extends java.lang.Object

The DBViewNode class serves as the interface layer between the NodePosition objects and the ViewNode table in the database.

                           throws java.sql.SQLException
Inserts a new viewnode record in the database and returns a NodePosition object representing this record.

Parameters:
DBConnection - dbcon com.compendium.core.db.management.DBConnection, the DBConnection object to access the database with.
view - com.compendium.core.datamodel.View, the view to insert the node into.
node - com.compendium.core.datamodel.NodeSummary, the node to insert into the view.
x, - the x position of the node in the view.
y, - the y position of the node in the view.
creation, - the creation date for this nodeview record.
modification, - the last modified date for this viewnode record.
Returns:
NodePosition object.
Throws:
java.sql.SQLException

insert

public static NodePosition insert(DBConnection dbcon,
                                  View view,
                                  NodeSummary node,
                                  int x,
                                  int y,
                                  java.util.Date creation,
                                  java.util.Date modification,

                                  boolean bShowTrans,
                                  boolean bShowWeight,

                                  boolean bHideIcon,
                                  int nWrapWidth,
                                  int nFontSize,
                                  java.lang.String sFontFace,
                                  int nFontStyle,
                                  int nForeground,
                                  int nBackground)
                           throws java.sql.SQLException
Inserts a new viewnode record in the database and returns a NodePosition object representing this record.

Parameters:
DBConnection - dbcon com.compendium.core.db.management.DBConnection, the DBConnection object to access the database with.
view - the view to insert the node into.
node - the node to insert into the view.
x - the x position of the node in the view.
y - the y position of the node in the view.
creation - the creation date for this nodeview record.
modification - the last modified date for this viewnode record.
sUserID - the current user.
bShowTags - true if this node has the tags indicator draw.
bShowText - true if this node has the text indicator drawn
bShowTrans - true if this node has the transclusion indicator drawn
bShowWeight - true if this node has the weight indicator displayed
bSmallIcon - true if this node is using a small icon
bHideIcons - true if this node is not displaying its icon
nWrapWidth - the node label wrap width used for this node in this view.
nFontSize - the font size used for this node in this view
sFontFace - the font face used for this node in this view
nFontStyle - the font style used for this node in this view
nForeground - the foreground color used for this node in this view
nBackground - the background color used for this node in this view.
Returns:
NodePosition object.
Throws:
java.sql.SQLException

Update the formatting properties for the given node in all its views.

Parameters:
DBConnection - dbcon com.compendium.core.db.management.DBConnection, the DBConnection object to access the database with.
sNodeID - the node id of the node to update the formatting in all view for.
modification - the last modified date for this viewnode record.
bShowTags - true if this node has the tags indicator draw.
bShowText - true if this node has the text indicator drawn
bShowTrans - true if this node has the transclusion indicator drawn
bShowWeight - true if this node has the weight indicator displayed
bSmallIcon - true if this node is using a small icon
bHideIcons - true if this node is not displaying its icon
nWrapWidth - the node label wrap width used for this node in this view.
nFontSize - the font size used for this node in this view
sFontFace - the font face used for this node in this view
nFontStyle - the font style used for this node in this view
nForeground - the foreground color used for this node in this view
nBackground - the background color used for this node in this view.
sUserID - the id of the current user.
Returns:
boolean, true if it was successful, else false.

java.sql.SQLException

public static java.util.Vector getViewNodes(DBConnection dbcon,
                                            java.lang.String sViewID)
                                     throws java.sql.SQLException
Returns the array of Node data for the given view id.

Parameters:
DBConnection - dbcon com.compendium.core.db.management.DBConnection, the DBConnection object to access the database with.
sViewID, - the id of the view to return node data for.
Returns:
Vector, of Vector. Each inner Vector conatins:
  • NodeID - String
  • ViewID - String
  • xPos - Integer
  • yPos - Integer
  • CreationDate - Double (milliseconds)
  • ModificationDate - Double (milliseconds)
  • Status - Integer
    Throws:
    java.sql.SQLException
